response:
Dear Customer,

Thank you for reaching out to Hermes and for your interest in our LTH0976 Leather Bifold Wallets. We are delighted to hear you are opening a new boutique and are considering our products for your inventory!

We received your request to order all available stock of the LTH0976 Leather Bifold Wallet.

Currently, this item is out of stock, which means we are unable to fulfill your request for these wallets at this moment. We understand this news may be disappointing, especially given your plans for your new boutique, and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this causes.

We would like to assure you that we do have a special promotion for new boutique owners, offering a 10% discount on bulk orders (5 or more units of an item). We would be very happy to apply this for you if you choose to order the LTH0976 wallets once they are restocked, or if you find other suitable items in our collection.

Would you like us to add you to our notification list? We can then contact you directly as soon as the LTH0976 Leather Bifold Wallets are back in stock.

We appreciate your understanding and are keen to help you find the perfect items for your new venture. Please let us know if you'd like to be notified or if there's anything else we can assist you with.

Best regards,
Hermes - Delivering divine fashion

Hi Jessica,

Thanks so much for reaching out to Hermes and for your interest in our Vibrant Tote (VBT2345)! We share your love for tote bags – they really are so wonderfully convenient.

I checked on the Vibrant Tote (VBT2345) for you, and I'm really sorry to let you know that it's currently out of stock due to high demand. I know this is disappointing news, especially when you've found something you like.

On a brighter note, we're currently having our Summer Sale, which means you can get 15% off all tote bags! While the Vibrant Tote isn't available at the moment, this fantastic discount could be applied to another gorgeous tote from our collection.

Would you like me to notify you the moment the Vibrant Tote (VBT2345) is back in stock? Alternatively, I'd be delighted to help you explore other tote bags in our collection that might catch your eye and also qualify for the 15% discount.

Please let us know how you'd like to proceed. We're here to help you find the perfect bag!

Best regards,
Hermes - Delivering divine fashion

Hello,

Thank you for contacting Hermes and for your interest in ordering the Infinity Scarves (SFT1098). We appreciate you thinking of us for your wife's scarf collection – it sounds like she has wonderful taste!

Regarding your request for three to four Infinity Scarves (SFT1098), we wanted to let you know that this item is unfortunately currently out of stock due to its popularity. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

We don't have immediate alternative suggestions for this specific scarf at the moment, but we would be more than happy to notify you the moment it becomes available again. Would you like us to add you to our notification list for the SFT1098 Infinity Scarf?

In the meantime, feel free to explore our other beautiful scarf collections on our website. Perhaps you'll find another treasure there.

Please let us know if you'd like to be notified or if there's anything else we can assist you with.

Best regards,
Hermes - Delivering divine fashion
